overview: From 2025-02-02 to 2025-02-09, elizaos/eliza had 174 new PRs (96 merged), 54 new issues, and 225 active contributors.

completedItems.title: Try loading character path from repo root
completedItems.body:
This allows the user to specify character paths relative to the repository root:

```
bun run agent -- -- --character=./characters/trump.character.json
```

We add `${cwd}../..` to the list of paths to try, to move up from `packages/a

completedItems.title: Fix yargs slice in character loading
completedItems.body:
To run an agent with a custom character you currently have to do (to escape a few layers of args parsing):

```
bun run agent -- -- --character=./characters/trump.character.json
```

However, this `yargs` parse slices off the argument
